blogs.title: How big money is past all shame
blogs.subtitle: The latest US election has shown us that big money has taken the next step in its influence, now they are not behind the politicians anymore, they are the politicians.
blogs.author: Koen Ceton
blogs.content:
So, here we are in my first every blog post, or colummn, or whatever. Writing I've always liked, as it allows you to think, process thoughs and form an opinion.

This should be the new paragraph if everything works corretly.
